doc.after: The procedures are generally performed by a traditional circumciser in the girls homes with or without anaesthesia The circumciser is usually an older woman but in communities where the male barber has assumed the role of health worker he will perform FGM too 28 Health professionals are often involved in Egypt Sudan and Kenya according to a 2008 survey in Egypt 77 percent of FGM procedures there were performed by medical professionals often physicians 29
